Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Oak Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Oak Park due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Oak Park due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#91 Austin

#54 Cicero

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
